course_description: This foundational clinical course builds family and emergency nurse practitioner knowledge and clinical skills. Emphasis is on assessment, diagnosis, and management of common health conditions encountered in the primary, urgent, and emergency care settings for patients across the lifespan.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1487, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: P. Tucker, Status: Closed
